name: Sword Build
description:
Device Requirement: Webcam

A game by Dabu and Kanon

Sword is a motion-sensing music game based on Media Pipe from Google. what you need is just a webcam and then play it! In this game, it can detect and simulate ur hands and transfer them to two points, which lead u the core mechanic: the line. You can easily change the position and direction of the line using your hands and try to cut the props flying to you.

There is also a VR Version.
